title: Долгий путь домой
overview: Nadya lives in the village with her parents. One day she meets a Muscovite, Vitaly Bolshakov, and immediately falls in love with the young and promising guy. Despite having a fiancé at home, the girl is determined to conquer the capital and the heart of her new lover. Meanwhile, in Moscow, Vitaly has his own life, work, and beloved woman. The persistent Nadya is not ready to just give him up to another, so she intends to do everything in her power to win her place in the sun. But will this bring her happiness?
